hero.title: The Legend Behind Our Mission
hero.subtitle: Every rep is a rescue. Every member is a lifter. This is the Pull-Up Club Ethos.

legend.title: The Legend of Alkeios
legend.quote1: In the early days of Battle Bunker, there was a soldier named <1>Alkeios</1>. During a brutal mission deep behind enemy lines, his unit was trapped — 100 men and women, buried alive in a collapsed underground bunker. The only way out was vertical — a 60-foot shaft with no ladder, no ropes, and no exit plan.
legend.quote2: One by one, Alkeios pulled them out with nothing but his bare hands and iron will — 100 rescues, each one costing him blood, pain, and breath. When the final soldier reached safety, Alkeios collapsed. His body was broken, but none were left behind.
legend.summary: That act of endurance, sacrifice, and unbreakable resolve became known as the origin of the Pull-Up Club — where every pull-up is a nod to the warrior who lifted others from the pit when all hope was gone.

purpose.title: The Purpose of Pull-Up Club
purpose.intro: Pull-ups are not just fitness — they're training for readiness, for rescue, for service. Every rep is a personal mission:

trainToSave.title: Train to Save
trainToSave.desc: Every pull-up is a rehearsal for rescue. We train not just for ourselves, but to be ready to lift others when it matters most.

strengthToLift.title: Strength to Lift Others
strengthToLift.desc: Our strength is measured by how many we can help. The Pull-Up Club is a community built on service, support, and lifting each other up.

disciplineToOvercome.title: Discipline to Overcome
disciplineToOvercome.desc: Discipline is forged in adversity. We overcome obstacles, rep by rep, building the mental toughness to face any challenge.

cta.title: Join the Mission
cta.subtitle: Every rep matters. Become part of a global community where strength is measured by service, and every pull-up is a story of rescue.
